Class RTPVideoAudioTransmitter

java.lang.Object
  ppc.remoteguard.guard.RTPVideoAudioTransmitter

public class RTPVideoAudioTransmitter
extends java.lang.Object

Classe RTPVideoAudioTransmitter per inviare gli stream RTP utilizzando RTPMultiplexerConnector.

Method Detail

start

public boolean start()
Starts the transmission. Returns null if transmission started ok. Otherwise it returns a string with the reason why the setup failed.

stop

public void stop()
Stops the transmission if already started

createProcessor

private boolean createProcessor()

createTransmitter

private boolean createTransmitter()
Use the RTPManager API to create sessions for each media track of the processor.

checkForVideoSizes

javax.media.Format checkForVideoSizes(javax.media.Format original,
                                      javax.media.Format supported)
For JPEG and H263, we know that they only work for particular sizes. So we'll perform extra checking here to make sure they are of the right sizes.

setJPEGQuality

void setJPEGQuality(javax.media.Player p,
                    float val)
Setting the encoding quality to the specified value on the JPEG encoder. 0.5 is a good default.
